history.narrative: Law 3-59 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-193, which was referred to the Committee on Human Resources. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 22, 1980, and February 5, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 26, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-155 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
